channel.title: Onenote on One Problem Solved

item.title: OneNote Keyboard Shortcuts
item.description: My Commonly-Used Shortcuts Shortcut Description Ctrl+G Switch notebook Ctrl+Shift+A Select current page Ctrl+Shift+T Move cursor to the page title Alt + Shift + ⇧ Move the selected page tab up ALT+PgUp Go to the first page Shift+F10 Bring up the context menu for any note, tab, or any other object that currently has focus.
